title-group.article-title: In-vehicle Network Verification from Application to Physical Layer

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2005 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: The verification of an in-vehicle network often requires to look at more than one level of abstraction at a time. At the moment, this is not addressed by existing methods, which are dedicated either to physical or application layer, but not both. This paper fills this gap by introducing a methodology to insert the protocol related software execution as well as the motor behavior into the physical layer mixed-signal (i.e. analog/digital) simulation. Electronics and mechanics are covered by the hardware description language VHDL-AMS, while the software is given in C.
